long_desc.thetext:
Just want to report these warnings, which you are probably aware of ...
- Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (198): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (237): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (257): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (279): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @param id String identifier of the parameter to add. - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (280): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @param value String Value of parameter. - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (297): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @param id String identifier of the parameter to remove. - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (312): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @param id String identifier of the parameter to get. - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (385): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (396): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (407): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (418): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (433): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (460): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (480): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (510): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadForm (527): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member / - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (147): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (166): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (177): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (188): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (203): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @deprecated Use getChildControl('textfield'); - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (212): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @deprecated Use getChildControl('textfield') - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (228): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadButton (155): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadButton (173): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadButton (196): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @type member - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadButton: '#' compiler hints are deprecated. Use the corresponding '@' JSDoc hints instead (see manual).

Hi Christian,
fixed with http://sourceforge.net/p/qooxdoo-contrib/code/21893 .
Please verify.
Thank you.

(In reply to comment #1) > Hi Christian, > > fixed with http://sourceforge.net/p/qooxdoo-contrib/code/21893 . > > Please verify. > > Thank you.
Wait. I've missed some warnings.

No everything should be fixed regarding JSDoc and @use hints:
http://sourceforge.net/p/qooxdoo-contrib/code/21894
@Christian: please verify.
Thank you.

Hi,
thanks for the quick response. I am still getting
- Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (199): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @deprecated Use getChildControl('textfield'); - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (208): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: @deprecated Use getChildControl('button')
under qooxdoo v4.0.1

(In reply to comment #4) > Hi, > > thanks for the quick response. I am still getting > > - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (199): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: > @deprecated Use getChildControl('textfield'); > - Warning: uploadwidget.UploadField (208): Unable to parse JSDoc entry: > @deprecated Use getChildControl('button') > > under qooxdoo v4.0.1
Ah yes. Thank you. The deprecation version hint was missing.
Im not shure about which version I should use here. The docs http://qooxdoo.readthedocs.org/en/latest/pages/development/api_jsdoc_ref.html#deprecated state that it should be the qooxdoo version, but I think it should be the contrib version.
I've set that to 0.4 as this is the version before trunk.
http://sourceforge.net/p/qooxdoo-contrib/code/21895
